DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine optimal safe tolerable dose gemcitabine combination daily twice daily dose PTK/ZK patient unresectable pancreatic cancer . The Phase II part study plan determine antitumor activity regimen effectiveness prevent tumor growth spread .
